name: Serpent's Tongue
description:
-- WIP / incomplete --
Currently only one 'act' is implemented into the game. Perhaps at some point I will revisit the project and implement more of the narrative. The HTML version of this game was also a test run for building a project to HTML5, this version is potentially unstable.

This game is in a state that is far from complete, this was created in ultimately a very short time and serves predominantly as prototype and a showcase of narrative storytelling and adaptation.

______________________________________________________________________________________________

'Serpent's Tongue' is a retro style, text based, linear, choose your own adventure narratively adapted from The Three Snake Leaves by Brothers Grimm.
